thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Docklands (Excel) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value and handy for Excel or O2
thread.title_full: Good value and handy for Excel or O2 - Review of Premier Inn London Docklands (Excel) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Olwen J
title: Good value and handy for Excel or O2
text:
Really handy location for Excel 2 min walk. Right on the DLR at Prince regent so 2 stops to canning town then 1 stop on jubilee to O2.
Hotel was efficient despite being full, breakfast was reasonably priced and even though it was buffet style was fresh and hot. Room was clean and had everything you would expect.
